uk.co.strangeskies.reflection

Class AnnotatedParameterizedTypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.strangeskies.reflection.AnnotatedParameterizedTypes

  • public final class AnnotatedParameterizedTypes
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of utility methods relating to annotated parameterised types.

    • Method Summary

      static java.util.Map<java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable<?>,java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedType> getAllTypeArguments(java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedParameterizedType type)
      For a given parameterized type, we retrieve a mapping of all type variables on its raw type, as given by ParameterizedTypes.getAllTypeParameters(Class) applied to the raw type of this annotated type, to their annotated arguments within the context of this type.

    • Method Detail

      • over

        public static java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedParameterizedType over(java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType type,
                                                                java.lang.annotation.Annotation... annotations)
        Annotate an existing ParameterizedType with the given annotations.
        Parameters:
        type - The parameterized type we wish to annotate.
        annotations - Annotations to put on the resulting AnnotatedParameterizedType.
        Returns:
        A new AnnotatedParameterizedType instance over the given parameterized type, with the given annotations.

        annotations - Annotations to put on the resulting AnnotatedParameterizedType.
        Returns:

      • from

        public static java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedParameterizedType from(java.lang.Class<?> rawType,
                                                                java.util.function.Function<? super java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable<?>,? extends java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedType> arguments,
                                                                java.lang.annotation.Annotation... annotations)
        Parameterize a generic class with the given annotated type arguments.
        Parameters:
        rawType - The generic class we wish to parameterize.
        arguments - A mapping from the type variables on the generic class to their annotated arguments.
        annotations - Annotations to put on the resulting AnnotatedParameterizedType.
        Returns:
        A new AnnotatedParameterizedType instance with the given type arguments, and the given annotations.

      • from

        public static java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedType from(java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedType rawType,
                                                   java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedType> arguments)
        Parameterize a generic class with the given annotated type arguments.
        Parameters:
        rawType - The annotated generic class we wish to parameterize.
        arguments - A mapping from the type variables on the generic class to their annotated arguments.
        Returns:
        A new AnnotatedParameterizedType instance with the given type arguments, and the given annotations.

      • getAllTypeArguments

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable<?>,java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedType> getAllTypeArguments(java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedParameterizedType type)
        For a given parameterized type, we retrieve a mapping of all type variables on its raw type, as given by ParameterizedTypes.getAllTypeParameters(Class) applied to the raw type of this annotated type, to their annotated arguments within the context of this type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type whose generic type arguments we wish to determine.
        Returns:
        A mapping of all type variables to their arguments in the context of the given type.

      • wrapImpl

        protected static uk.co.strangeskies.reflection.AnnotatedParameterizedTypes.AnnotatedParameterizedTypeImpl wrapImpl(java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedParameterizedType type)

      • wrap

        public static java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedParameterizedType wrap(java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedParameterizedType type)
        Wrap an existing annotated parameterized type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type we wish to wrap.
        Returns:
        A new instance of AnnotatedParameterizedType which is equal to the given type.
